usage.cn: 我喜欢偶尔出差一次，来点改变。
usage.eng: I like to take an occasional business trip for a change.

usage.cn: 你不知道这次出差行程安排的有多紧张。
usage.eng: You don't know how tight the schedule is for this business trip.

usage.cn: 我不能错过10点钟的火车。我有公务，要出差去北京。
usage.eng: I can't miss the ten o'clock train. I'm going to Beijing on business.

usage.cn: 和我们老板一起出差让人非常有压力。
usage.eng: Nothing is more stressful than going on a business trip with our boss.
